page.title: 09Ball Green School-Norton
page.content: The school that I go to is Ball Green Primary. It is right on the edge of the countryside. We do a lot of sports like netball, hockey,rounders,cross-country and football. In our school we have class assemblies nearly every Friday. Somtimes we go on field trips.There are twenty nine rooms,fourteen teachers,347 children,three assistants, one caretaker and three cleaners. At first playtime some top year children sell crisps. Our school is lively and has teams or houses which have names of local places like Whitfield and Ridgeway. My favourite subjects are P.E. and maths but I dislike Geography English and History.
